mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, PAGING.* FROM (SELECT TARGET_MEMBER, COUNT(*) A_COUNT FROM ACCUSE WHERE TARGET_MEMBER is not null GROUP BY TARGET_MEMBER ORDER BY A_COUNT DESC) PAGING) WHERE RNUM <6
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, PAGING.* FROM (SELECT TARGET_GROUP, COUNT(*) A_COUNT FROM ACCUSE WHERE TARGET_GROUP is not null GROUP BY TARGET_GROUP ORDER BY A_COUNT DESC) PAGING) WHERE RNUM <6
